entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow or rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
